title: Hayley Mills storybook volume 3
brief_description: Hayley Mills presents 6 animated children’s tales including: “Myra”, “I’m not Oscar’s friend anymore”, “Martha Ann and the mother store”, “The Man who had no dream”, plus two tales from the Brothers Grimm, “Hans in luck” and “Three golden hairs”.
